Additional life-threatening emergency types are planned to be added regularly to the offline database through app updates. This ensures offline users have access to more emergency protocols without requiring internet connectivity.
Each emergency type includes step-by-step life-saving instructions that work without internet connectivity.

Anyone can use these direct action phrases to skip initial context assessment and get immediate, specific guidance:
• CPR - Immediate chest compressions and rescue breathing
• Heimlich - Abdominal thrusts for choking
• AED - Automated external defibrillator usage
• Tourniquet - Bleeding control for severe injuries
• EpiPen - Emergency epinephrine administration
• Rescue Breathing - Artificial ventilation
• First Aid - Basic emergency care
• FAST Test - Stroke assessment (Face, Arm, Speech, Time)
• Poison Control - Emergency poison management
• Cool Burn - Burn treatment and cooling
• Medical Alert - Medical identification check
When hybrid online/offline mode is active, the app provides unlimited emergency types with enhanced AI-powered guidance. The AI can handle any emergency scenario without database limitations.
